channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Loose/rattling cover/ironwork problem, 7th February
item.description:
road being resurfaced in the square - contractors have completly blocked a drain with sludge and other detrius needs urgent attention to clear

item.title: Huge collection of pot holes, 7th February
item.description:
Numerous potholes requiring vehicles to swerve around them to avoid damage to vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chiltern Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Disgustingly large collection of pot holes, 7th February
item.description:
Stretch of priors road from JCT of chiltern Road to Prestbury Road. This road was repaired last year with sub standard fills and less than 6/10 months later it’s even worst than before.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chiltern Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Blocked road drainage gratings, 7th February
item.description:
Drain gratings blocked with debris causing road to flood in heavy rain. Particularly on bend near bridge over river.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Cirencester Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Whole road is now a track, 7th February
item.description:
There are so many potholes here. Whole road needs resurfacing. It’s horrendous and really dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Charlton Kings, Cheltenham

item.title: Multiple potholes, 7th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes in a cluster as you’re coming down the hill

item.title: Surface water flooding, 7th February
item.description:
This section of road is suffering from surface water flooding; creating a significant hazard for vehicles and cycles. Suspected blocked road drain. Been going in for nearly a year now. Opposite Evington Hill Farm.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: See issues Nos 2203826 and 2203824, 7th February
item.description:
I was informed that the potholes I reported on the road up towards Cleeve Common from the Syreford/ Whittington Road had been repaired. In fact on a random selection of the 4cm+ deep potholes have been repaired see photos

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whittington, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked road drain, 7th February
item.description:
Blocked road drain causing flooding on road. This has been blocked for about a year now. It causes an obstruction to the highway and also a nuisance for pedestrians who can get soaked by passing vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Down Hatherley Lane, Down Hatherley, Tewkesbury

item.description:
Tyres and drums seem dumped in lay by.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury

item.title: Damaged pavement at the end of Kensington Avenue by no 17/18, 7th February
item.description:
All traffic coming down the Avenue turns here and it needs resurfacing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Kensington Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Overgrown trees and foliage on the embankment between 18 Kensington Avenue and the train station, causing damage to our house., 7th February
item.description:
The area between 18 Kensington Avenue and the station car park is overgrown and is causing damage to my house. I’ve had a structural engineer out to visit, who says the trees need cutting back before the growing season starts, so I’d be grateful for someone to get in touch asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Kensington Avenue, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing slab not fixed causing obstruction, 7th February
item.description:
It’s on the path of Lobley’s Drive next to Stearman Walk path not far from the traffic lights. I believe it’s probably already been reported however as for someone who uses a pushchair I can’t pass this area and crossing the road to go around isn’t easy with a push chair. It’s been like this for months. It would be nice for it to finally be fixed to make passing much easier.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beamont Walk, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gras verge damaged by bio foods lorry, 7th February
item.description:
Foodlorry has left large tyre marks on the grass verge very large tyre tracks.last time this happened Tewkesbury Council sent a street cleaner to clear up the mud on the road nothing else was done about it.It delivers to the school every day
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Path/Way misused by unlawful users problem, 7th February
item.description:
I would ask that we have more prominent signage on the bridlepath at both ends and also extra signs to make it clear that it is only for the access of Hyde View and Hyde Lodge.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path/Way doesn't match map problem, 7th February
item.description:
Customer would like to discuss changing this PROW as the missing link will change traffic which will have a knock on effect with foot traffic, leading to more use of path. Would like to divert it away from his garden at the Golden Hart. Would like to speak to PROW officer re arranging a site visit to discuss this.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged road around the drain cover, 7th February
item.description:
The road around the drain cover in front of 114/116 Farmfield Road has depressed creating a hazard for vehicles passing over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 114, Farmfield Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Corner of Milbrook street/ Great Western Terrace Drain blocked causing flooding, 7th February
item.description:
Corner of Milbrook street/ Great Western Terrace Corner of number 1 great western terrace Foul smell coming from drain with rain also

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Millbrook Street, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars keep parking across this dropped kerb opposite my house, 7th February
item.description:
When asked if they happen to be leaving (as the road is narrow and it creates problems entering or exiting my driveway) they become rude and combatitive. I have tried to suggest that they are in breach of the highway code, as though the council have allowed them to pay for the kerb to be dropped, the land does not in fact belong to them (or their mother who is the one I believe lives there) they insist it's their dropped kerb and they can do what they like, and become rude and aggressive. I have tried to broach the topic politely, and asked if they couldn't park just opposite on the road, like every one else, and they suggested everyone else parked legally around my driveway was at fault instead and I should pay to have with widenend (which I can't as it's a housing association home) I am disabled with regular carers, and a young child. There's no public transport here and we are not near any shops when considering autistic children/adults and need to use a wheelchair. Access in and out of my drive is vital and I am not having any luck asking nicely if things could change.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pillcroft Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 7th February
item.description:
Large pothole in road
Report on FixMyStreet
